metadata.name: Renamed SysInternals DebugView Execution
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious renamed SysInternals DebugView execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('sysinternals debugview') AND NOT (lower(process.file.name) = lower('dbgview.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dbgview.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious renamed SysInternals DebugView execution
